### Load libraries

```{r}
library(DBI) 
library(tidyverse)
library(duckdb)
library(dbplyr)
```

### Load data

```{r}

# Connect to database
conn <- DBI::dbConnect(duckdb::duckdb(), dbdir='yield_calendar.db', read_only = FALSE)
DBI::dbListTables(conn)

# Read in database data
yield_calendar <- tbl(conn, "yield_calendar")

```
